content.text: Match ends, Atlético de Madrid 2, Sampdoria 0.
Second Half ends, Atlético de Madrid 2, Sampdoria 0.
Attempt saved. Francesco Fedato (Sampdoria) right footed shot from long range on the left is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Federico Piovaccari.
Attempt blocked. Francesco Fedato (Sampdoria) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Nenad Krsticic.
Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Roberto Núñez replaces Cristian Rodríguez.
Francesco Fedato (Sampdoria) hits the left post with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by José Campaña.
